hero.title: Hi, I'm Anjali Kumari
hero.description: A passionate full-stack developer with expertise in creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. Focused on building responsive, optimized and engaging websites.

about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: Know Me More
about.heading: I'm a Web Developer & Tech Enthusiast
paragraphs: I'm a passionate web developer with a strong foundation in front-end and back-end technologies. I love turning creative ideas into functional, user-friendly websites. With experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and PHP, I specialize in building responsive and interactive web applications that provide smooth user experiences.

My approach to design and development is centered around solving real problems for users while keeping code clean, maintainable, and well-documented. I enjoy working in collaborative environments and believe in continuous learning and improvement.

skills.subtitle: My Skills
skills.title: What I Do
skills.description: Here are some of the technologies and tools I'm proficient with. I continuously expand my skillset to stay updated with the latest trends and technologies.

items.title: Blog Website
items.description: Designed and developed a dynamic blog platform to share insights on [insert niche, e.g., web development, tech trends, personal growth]. The website features a clean, responsive UI, user-friendly navigation, and optimized content structure to enhance reader engagement. Integrated features include post categorization, search functionality, and social sharing

items.title: ModishMart
items.description: Developed a fully functional eCommerce website focused on modern fashion and lifestyle products. Designed a responsive, user-friendly interface with seamless navigation and product browsing.

items.title: bhagavad Geeta
items.description: Developed an interactive web application that presents the Bhagavad Gita in a modern, user-friendly digital book format.

items.title: Netflix Clone
items.description: Built a responsive Netflix Clone web application that mimics the look and feel of the original Netflix platform.

items.title: Quiz App
items.description: Developed a dynamic and responsive Quiz App using React.js to help users test their knowledge in various subjects

items.title: Password Generator
items.description: Created a responsive and easy-to-use Password Generator using React.js that allows users to generate secure and customizable passwords instantly.

items.title: Snake & Ladder
items.description: Built a digital version of the classic Snake and Ladder board game using React.js. The app features interactive gameplay, dynamic movement, and engaging visuals, making it enjoyable for users of all ages.

items.title: eCommerce Website
items.description: Developing a full-stack eCommerce web application where users can explore, view, and purchase products like laptop chargers and accessories.
